verses.roman:
saba bhakta-gaṇe prabhu milāilā sanātane
sanātana kailā sabāra caraṇa vandane

synonyms: saba—all; bhakta-gaṇe—devotees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; milāilā—introduced; sanātane—to Sanātana Gosvāmī; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; kailā—did; sabāra—of all of them; caraṇa vandane—worshiping the lotus feet.
translation: The Lord introduced all the devotees to Sanātana Gosvāmī, who offered his respectful obeisances unto the lotus feet of them all.
